name: Jewel Quest 2 Saved Game
summary: A JQ2SAVEGAME file is a saved game file created by Jewel Quest II, a tile-matching puzzle video game published by iWin. It contains a record of a player's progress in Jewel Quest II. JQ2SAVEGAME files cannot be used to migrate saved Jewel Quest II games from one computer to another.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
